explains: n. （小说或电影的）叙述者，叙事人；（电影或电视节目中的）解说员，旁白员

sentences.en: The novel has an omniscient narrator.
sentences.cn: 这部小说有一个全知全能的叙述者。

sentences.en: Suddenly, the narrator speaks in his most rhetorically elevated mode.
sentences.cn: 突然，讲述者以其最华丽的措辞方式讲起来。

sentences.en: His fictionalized portrait of the artist as a young man is recalled by an older, disillusioned narrator.
sentences.cn: 他虚构的艺术家年轻时的肖像由一位年长、醒悟的叙述者回忆起来。
